TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This lookup is used to get Demand_Driver from FCST_DPR_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_FCST_DPR_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM_SLSP_MFB_NOT_EQUAL

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.legacy_source AS LEGACY_SOURCE, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_driver AS DEMAND_DRIVER, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_loc AS DEMAND_LOC, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.style AS STYLE, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.color AS COLOR, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.item_code_attr_cde AS ITEM_CODE_ATTR_CDE, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.item_code_siz AS ITEM_CODE_SIZ FROM (SELECT fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.legacy_source AS LEGACY_SOURCE , fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_driver AS DEMAND_DRIVER , Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_style_code) AS STYLE, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_color_code) AS COLOR, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_attribute_code) AS ITEM_CODE_ATTR_CDE, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_size_code) AS ITEM_CODE_SIZ , Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_loc) AS demand_loc FROM fcst_dpr_finished_product_item WHERE legacy_source IN ( 'CSW', 'CHP', 'PRT' ) AND aps_corp_business_unit IN ( 'CSW', 'CHP', 'PRT' ) and Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_loc) <> '__' UNION ALL SELECT fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.legacy_source AS LEGACY_SOURCE , fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_driver AS DEMAND_DRIVER, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_style_code) AS STYLE, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_color_code) AS COLOR, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_attribute_code) AS ITEM_CODE_ATTR_CDE, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_size_code) AS ITEM_CODE_SIZ , Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_loc) AS demand_loc FROM fcst_dpr_finished_product_item WHERE legacy_source IN ( 'HBI' ) and Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_loc) <> '__') fcst_dpr_finished_product_item

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: STYLE = STYLE_NUM AND COLOR = COLOR_CODE AND ITEM_CODE_ATTR_CDE = ATTRIBUTION_CODE AND ITEM_CODE_SIZ = SIZE_NUM

TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.legacy_source AS LEGACY_SOURCE, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_driver AS DEMAND_DRIVER, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_loc AS DEMAND_LOC, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.style AS STYLE, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.color AS COLOR, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.item_code_attr_cde AS ITEM_CODE_ATTR_CDE, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.item_code_siz AS ITEM_CODE_SIZ FROM (SELECT fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.legacy_source AS LEGACY_SOURCE , fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_driver AS DEMAND_DRIVER , Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_style_code) AS STYLE, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_color_code) AS COLOR, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_attribute_code) AS ITEM_CODE_ATTR_CDE, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_size_code) AS ITEM_CODE_SIZ , Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_loc) AS demand_loc FROM fcst_dpr_finished_product_item WHERE legacy_source IN ( 'CSW', 'CHP', 'PRT' ) AND aps_corp_business_unit IN ( 'CSW', 'CHP', 'PRT' ) UNION ALL SELECT fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.legacy_source AS LEGACY_SOURCE , fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_driver AS DEMAND_DRIVER, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_style_code) AS STYLE, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_color_code) AS COLOR, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_attribute_code) AS ITEM_CODE_ATTR_CDE, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_size_code) AS ITEM_CODE_SIZ , Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_loc) AS demand_loc FROM fcst_dpr_finished_product_item WHERE legacy_source IN ( 'HBI' )) fcst_dpr_finished_product_item

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This lookup tranformation is used to get SLBA_ITEM data.

TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT SLBA_ITEM.ITEM_ID as ITEM_ID, SLBA_ITEM.STYLE_NUM as STYLE_NUM, TRIM(SLBA_ITEM.X_SIZE) as X_SIZE, TRIM(SLBA_ITEM.SIZE_POSITION) as SIZE_POSITION, TRIM(SLBA_ITEM.SIZE_LINE) as SIZE_LINE, TRIM(SLBA_ITEM.PACK_CODE) as PACK_CODE FROM SLBA_ITEM WHERE SLBA_ITEM.ITEM_TYPE = 'MFG'

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: THIS LOOKUP IS TO GET DATA FROM ITEM_DC_VW
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_ITEM_DC_VW

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT DISTINCT ITEM_CODE AS ITEM_CODE , ltrim(rtrim(APS_STYLE_CD)) AS APS_STYLE_CD, ltrim(rtrim(APS_COLOR_CD)) AS APS_COLOR_CD, ltrim(rtrim(ATTRIBUTE_CODE)) AS ATTRIBUTE_CODE, ltrim(rtrim(SIZE_CODE)) AS SIZE_CODE FROM ITEM_DC_VW WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE DC_CODE = '*NONE'

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: lookup to get grid value
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_SLBA_ITEM_SAP_GRID_VALUE

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT SLBA_ITEM.SAP_GRID_VALUE as SAP_GRID_VALUE, SLBA_ITEM.SELLING_STYLE as SELLING_STYLE, SLBA_ITEM.COLOR_CODE as COLOR_CODE, SLBA_ITEM.SIZE_NUM as SIZE_NUM, SLBA_ITEM.ATTRIBUTION_CODE as ATTRIBUTION_CODE FROM (SELECT SLBA_ITEM.SAP_GRID_VALUE as SAP_GRID_VALUE,MAX(SLBA_ITEM.ITEM_ID) AS ITEM_ID, SLBA_ITEM.SELLING_STYLE as SELLING_STYLE, SLBA_ITEM.COLOR_CODE as COLOR_CODE, SLBA_ITEM.SIZE_NUM as SIZE_NUM, SLBA_ITEM.ATTRIBUTION_CODE as ATTRIBUTION_CODE FROM SLBA_ITEM group by SLBA_ITEM.SAP_GRID_VALUE, SLBA_ITEM.SELLING_STYLE, SLBA_ITEM.COLOR_CODE, SLBA_ITEM.SIZE_NUM, SLBA_ITEM.ATTRIBUTION_CODE )SLBA_ITEM ORDER BY SLBA_ITEM.ITEM_ID --

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELLING_STYLE = I_SELLING_STYLE AND COLOR_CODE = I_COLOR_CODE AND SIZE_NUM = I_SIZE_NUM AND ATTRIBUTION_CODE = I_ATTRIBUTION_CODE

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT FCST_DPR_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.DEMAND_DRIVER as DEMAND_DRIVER, LTRIM(RTRIM(FCST_DPR_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.STYLE)) as STYLE, LTRIM(RTRIM(FCST_DPR_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.COLOR)) as COLOR FROM FCST_DPR_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: this lookup is to get the class_code_LV3
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_MTM_CLASSIFICATION_CODE

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select slc.item_id AS ITEM_ID, cc.class_code_lv3 AS CLASS_CODE_LV3 from mtm_classification_code cc, sku_lifecycle_class slc, lifecycle_class lc where slc.end_date >= (select as_of_date - 7 from day_dimension where day_date = trunc(sysdate)) and slc.lifecycle_code = lc.lifecycle_code and lc.lifecycle_desc = cc.class_code_lv3_desc

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This lookup is used to get data from SLS_BOM table.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_SLS_BOM

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT DISTINCT SI.ITEM_ID AS ITEM_ID, CASE WHEN (COMPONENT_IUM/GARM_PER_PKG_QTY=1) THEN A.FREE_PAIRS ELSE ROUND(A.FREE_PAIRS/(COMPONENT_IUM/GARM_PER_PKG_QTY),0) END AS PKG_FREE FROM SLS_BOM A JOIN SLBA_ITEM SI ON A.ITEM_ID=SI.ITEM_ID WHERE FREE_PAIRS <> 0 AND A.SKU=COMPONENT

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This lookup transformation is used to SAP_WHOLESALE_PRICE from SAP_ITEM table for division_group = 'slsp'

TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT SAP_ITEM.SAP_WHOLESALE_PRICE as SAP_WHOLESALE_PRICE, trim(SAP_ITEM.GRID_VALUE) as GRID_VALUE, trim(SAP_ITEM.MATERIAL_NUM) as MATERIAL_NUM FROM SAP_ITEM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: THIS LOOKUP IS TO GET DATA FROM FROM [EDM].[dbo].[plnr_fcst_hierarchy]

TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT plnr_fcst_hierarchy.Plnr_fcst_hierarchy_id as Plnr_fcst_hierarchy_id, plnr_fcst_hierarchy.planner1_id as planner1_id, plnr_fcst_hierarchy.planner2_id as planner2_id, plnr_fcst_hierarchy.planner3_id as planner3_id, plnr_fcst_hierarchy.planner4_id as planner4_id, plnr_fcst_hierarchy.division_group_id as division_group_id, plnr_fcst_hierarchy.STYLE_NUM_ID as STYLE_NUM_ID FROM plnr_fcst_hierarchy with (nolock) where plnr_fcst_hierarchy.style_group_id='500000'

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This lookup is used to get Demand_Driver from FCST_DPR_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_FCST_DPR_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM_SLU

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT FCST_DPR_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.DEMAND_DRIVER as DEMAND_DRIVER, SUBSTR(LTRIM(RTRIM(FCST_DPR_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.ITEM_CODE)), LENGTH(LTRIM(RTRIM(FCST_DPR_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.ITEM_CODE)))-1,2) as ITEM_CODE, LTRIM(RTRIM(FCST_DPR_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.STYLE)) as STYLE FROM FCST_DPR_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This expression is used to calculate the columns based on logic.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_DEMAND_PRODUCT_CALC

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(I_DIVISION_GROUP <> 'slsp',NULL, IIF((NOT ISNULL(SOURCE_SAP_GRID_VALUE) AND SOURCE_SAP_GRID_VALUE <> ' '), IIF((NOT ISNULL(UPC_CODE) AND UPC_CODE <> ' '), IIF(NOT ISNULL(I_SAP_GRID_VALUE),I_SAP_GRID_VALUE,SOURCE_SAP_GRID_VALUE), IIF(NOT ISNULL(V_LKP_MFG_STYLE_CD),V_LKP_SLBA_ITEM_GRID_VALUE,SOURCE_SAP_GRID_VALUE) ), NULL))
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: V_SAP_GRID_VALUE

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF((NOT ISNULL(I_Source_SAP_MATERIAL_NUM) AND I_Source_SAP_MATERIAL_NUM <> ' '), IIF((NOT ISNULL(UPC_CODE) AND UPC_CODE <> ' '), IIF(NOT ISNULL(I_SAP_MATERIAL_NUM),I_SAP_MATERIAL_NUM,I_Source_SAP_MATERIAL_NUM), IIF(NOT ISNULL(V_LKP_MFG_STYLE_CD),V_LKP_SLBA_ITEM_MTRL_NUM,I_Source_SAP_MATERIAL_NUM) ), NULL)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: V_SAP_MATERIAL_NUM

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(NOT ISNULL(I_ITEM_CODE), IIF(I_ITEM_CODE <>V_DPR_ITEM_CODE_DEFT, I_ITEM_CODE, I_DPR_ITEM_CODE1), IIF(NOT ISNULL(I_DPR_ITEM_CODE), IIF(I_DPR_ITEM_CODE<>V_DPR_ITEM_CODE_DEFT, I_DPR_ITEM_CODE, I_DPR_ITEM_CODE1), I_DPR_ITEM_CODE1) )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: V_ITEM_CODE

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: THIS LOOKUP WILL GET THE LAST SHIP DATE

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT FCST_SKU_SHIP_DATES.LAST_SHIP_DATE as LAST_SHIP_DATE, FCST_SKU_SHIP_DATES.FCST_SKU_KEY as FCST_SKU_KEY FROM FCST_SKU_SHIP_DATES FCST_SKU_SHIP_DATES

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: THIS LOOKUP IS TO GET DATA FROM FROM [EDM].[dbo].[plnr_fcst_hierarchy]
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_PLNR_FCST_HIERARCHY_DIVGRP_STYLERP_ID

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT plnr_fcst_hierarchy.Plnr_fcst_hierarchy_id as Plnr_fcst_hierarchy_id, plnr_fcst_hierarchy.planner1_id as planner1_id, plnr_fcst_hierarchy.planner2_id as planner2_id, plnr_fcst_hierarchy.planner3_id as planner3_id, plnr_fcst_hierarchy.planner4_id as planner4_id, plnr_fcst_hierarchy.style_group_id as style_group_id, plnr_fcst_hierarchy.division_group_id as division_group_id FROM plnr_fcst_hierarchy with (nolock)

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This lookup is used to get data from STYLE_GROUP table.

TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT Style_Group.loe_id as loe_id, Style_Group.Style_Group_ID as Style_Group_ID FROM Style_Group with (NOLOCK)

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This lookup is used to get Demand_Driver from DA._MIN_MAX
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_DA_MIN_MAX

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT DISTINCT STYLE AS STYLE , COLOR AS COLOR , ATTRIBUTE_CD AS ATTRIBUTE_CD , SIZE_CD as SIZE_CD FROM MIN_MAX

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: STYLE = I_STYLE_NUM AND COLOR = I_COLOR_CODE AND ATTRIBUTE_CD = I_ATTRIBUTION_CODE AND SIZE_CD = I_SIZE_NUM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This source qualifier is used to get records from sources SLBA_ITEM SI, SAP_ITEM SA, STYLE_MASTER_1 SM1, FCST_BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY FBSH, FCST_ITEM_SKU A, FCST_DIVISION_CONTROL B
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SLBA_ITEM_SM_FCST_ITEM_SKU

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select a.ITEM_ID, a.STYLE_NUM , a.COLOR_CODE, a.ATTRIBUTION_CODE, a.SIZE_NUM, a.SIZE_DESC, a.SIZE_MNEMON_CODE, a.STYLE_GROUP, a.CUP_SIZE, a.GARM_PER_PKG_QTY, a.PACK_CODE, a.SAP_WHOLESALE_PRICE, a.BRAND_NAME, a.CAPACITY_GROUP, a.DIVISION_GROUP, a.SAP_GRID_VALUE, a.SAP_MATERIAL_NUM, a.X_SIZE, a.SIZE_POSITION, a.SIZE_LINE, a.COMPANY_CODE , a.DIVISION_CODE, a.LRP_STYLE, a.MASTER_GRMT_STYLE, a.SELLING_STYLE, a.GENDER_CATEGORY_DESC, a.GENDER_DESC, a.MARKETING_LOB_GROUP, a.CATEGORY_DESC, a.SUBCATEGORY_DESC, a.FABRICATION, a.SILHOUETTE, a.DUMMY_STYLE_IND, a.LEVEL_3_NAME, a.FREE_GOODS_QTY, a.COLOR_NAME, a.PRODUCT_GROUP_DESC, a.UPC_CODE, a.PRODUCT_LINE_DESC, a.BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID, a.FCST_SKU_KEY, a.UPDATE_USERID, a.STYLE_DESC from (SELECT FIS.ITEM_ID as ITEM_ID, TRIM (SI.STYLE_NUM) AS STYLE_NUM , SI.COLOR_CODE as COLOR_CODE, SI.ATTRIBUTION_CODE as ATTRIBUTION_CODE, SI.SIZE_NUM as SIZE_NUM, SI.SIZE_DESC as SIZE_DESC, SI.SIZE_MNEMON_CODE as SIZE_MNEMON_CODE, SM1.STYLE_GROUP as STYLE_GROUP, SI.CUP_SIZE as CUP_SIZE, NVL(SI.GARM_PER_PKG_QTY,1) as GARM_PER_PKG_QTY, SI.PACK_CODE as PACK_CODE, SI.SAP_WHOLESALE_PRICE as SAP_WHOLESALE_PRICE, SI.BRAND_NAME as BRAND_NAME, SI.CAPACITY_GROUP as CAPACITY_GROUP, SI.DIVISION_GROUP as DIVISION_GROUP, SI.SAP_GRID_VALUE as SAP_GRID_VALUE, SI.SAP_MATERIAL_NUM as SAP_MATERIAL_NUM, SI.X_SIZE as X_SIZE, SI.SIZE_POSITION as SIZE_POSITION, SI.SIZE_LINE as SIZE_LINE, NVL(TRIM (SI.COMPANY_CODE),'--') AS COMPANY_CODE , SI.DIVISION_CODE as DIVISION_CODE, SM1.LRP_STYLE as LRP_STYLE, SM1.MASTER_GRMT_STYLE as MASTER_GRMT_STYLE, SM1.SELLING_STYLE as SELLING_STYLE, SM1.GENDER_CATEGORY_DESC as GENDER_CATEGORY_DESC, SM1.GENDER_DESC as GENDER_DESC, SM1.MARKETING_LOB_GROUP as MARKETING_LOB_GROUP, SM1.CATEGORY_DESC as CATEGORY_DESC, SM1.SUBCATEGORY_DESC as SUBCATEGORY_DESC, SM1.FABRICATION as FABRICATION, SM1.SILHOUETTE as SILHOUETTE, SM1.DUMMY_STYLE_IND as DUMMY_STYLE_IND, SM1.LEVEL_3_NAME as LEVEL_3_NAME, SI.FREE_GOODS_QTY as FREE_GOODS_QTY, SI.COLOR_NAME as COLOR_NAME, SM1.PRODUCT_GROUP_DESC as PRODUCT_GROUP_DESC, SI.UPC_CODE as UPC_CODE, SI.PRODUCT_LINE_DESC as PRODUCT_LINE_DESC, FIS.BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID as BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID, FIS.FCST_SKU_KEY as FCST_SKU_KEY, FIS.UPDATE_USERID AS UPDATE_USERID, SM1.STYLE_DESC AS STYLE_DESC, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (Partition by FIS.FCST_SKU_KEY,FIS.BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID ORDER BY FIS.ITEM_ID DESC) RNK FROM SLBA_ITEM SI, STYLE_MASTER_1 SM1 , FCST_ITEM_SKU FIS, fcst_division_control b WHERE SI.DIVISION_GROUP = SM1.DIVISION_GROUP AND RTRIM(SI.STYLE_NUM)= RTRIM(SM1.STYLE_NUM) AND decode(si.company_code,null,'--',' ','--',si.company_code) = sm1.company_code AND (SI.ITEM_STATUS <> 'X' or SI.ITEM_STATUS is null) AND FIS.ITEM_ID=SI.ITEM_ID AND FIS.FCST_SKU_KEY !='UNMAPPED' and b.active_ind = 'Y' and fis.division_code = b.division_code AND fis.division_group = b.division_group )a where a.RNK=1

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: THIS LOOKUP IS TO GET VALUES FOR DEMAND DRIVER FOR SLSP
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_DPR_CORP_DIVISION

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT APS_CORP_DIVISION_CODE AS APS_CORP_DIVISION_CODE, DEFAULT_DEMAND_TYPE AS DEMAND_TYPE FROM DPR_CORP_DIVISION WITH (NOLOCK)

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: THIS LOOKUP IS TO GET VALUES FOR SKU FORMAT
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_DPR_CORP_DIVISION_SKU_FMT

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT DISTINCT DPR_CORP_DIVISION.SKU_FORMAT as SKU_FORMAT, DPR_CORP_DIVISION.APS_CORP_DIVISION_CODE as APS_CORP_DIVISION_CODE FROM DPR_CORP_DIVISION WITH (NOLOCK) order by APS_CORP_DIVISION_CODE ,SKU_FORMAT--

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This lookup transformation is used to get the CURRENT_STD_COST from ITEM_COST table.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_ITEM_COST

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select (current_std_cost/12) as CURRENT_STD_COST , i.item_id as ITEM_ID from ITEM_COST ic inner join ( select distinct i.item_id from item i, (select item_id, style_num, SKU, substr(sku,(length(sku)-3),1) X_SIZE, substr(sku,(length(sku)-1),1) SIZE_LINE, substr(sku,(length(sku)),1) SIZE_POS, substr(sku,(length(sku)-2),1) PACK_CODE from item where division_group='slu' and item_type_code='SEL' ) its where i.X_SIZE=its.x_size and i.size_line=its.size_line and i.size_pos=its.size_pos and i.pack_code=its.pack_code and item_type_code='MFG' and division_group='slu' ) i on i.item_id=ic.item_id where SRC_APP_CODE = 'UCT' and COST_TYPE_CD = 'D' and TIMEFRAME_CODE IN ('C' ,'P') and COST_CODE = 'FS'

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This expression is used to get the DEMAND_DRIVER column.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_DEMAND_DRIVER

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
IIF(IN (I_DIVISION_GROUP,'slsp' , 'mfb','S4')and not isnull (:LKP.LKP_DA_MIN_MAX(I_STYLE_NUM,I_COLOR_CODE,I_ATTRIBUTION_CODE,I_SIZE_NUM)),'MTO',NULL)
--IIF(I_DIVISION_GROUP='slsp' and not isnull --(:LKP.LKP_DA_MIN_MAX(I_STYLE_NUM,I_COLOR_CODE,I_ATTRIBUTION_CODE,I_SIZE_NUM)),'MTO',NULL)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: V_LKP_SLSP_MIN_MAX

TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT a.ITEM_ID as ITEM_ID, a.FCST_SKU_KEY as FCST_SKU_KEY, a.BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID as BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID from (select min (SI.item_id ) as ITEM_ID,fis.fcst_sku_key as fcst_sku_key,fis.BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID as BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID FROM SLBA_ITEM SI, STYLE_MASTER_1 SM1 , FCST_ITEM_SKU FIS, fcst_division_control b WHERE SI.DIVISION_GROUP = SM1.DIVISION_GROUP AND RTRIM(SI.STYLE_NUM)= RTRIM(SM1.STYLE_NUM) AND decode(si.company_code,null,'--',' ','--',si.company_code) = sm1.company_code AND (SI.ITEM_STATUS <> 'X' or SI.ITEM_STATUS is null) AND FIS.ITEM_ID=SI.ITEM_ID AND FIS.FCST_SKU_KEY !='UNMAPPED' and b.active_ind = 'Y' and fis.division_code = b.division_code AND fis.division_group = b.division_group AND SI.DIVISION_GROUP ='slsp' and trim(SI.sap_grid_value) is not null and trim(SI.sap_material_num) is not null GROUP BY fis.fcst_sku_key, fis.BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID )a

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select b.item_id as ITEM_ID, decode(trim(b.size_num),NULL,decode(trim(b.sku),NULL,a.size_num,substr(trim(b.sku),length(trim(b.sku))-1,2)),trim(b.size_num)) as SIZE_NUM, decode(trim(b.size_line),NULL,decode(trim(b.sku),NULL,substr(a.size_num,1,1),substr(trim(b.sku),length(trim(b.sku))-1,1)),trim(b.size_line)) as SIZE_LINE, decode(trim(b.size_position),NULL,decode(trim(b.sku),NULL,substr(a.size_num,2,1),substr(trim(b.sku),length(trim(b.sku)),1)),trim(b.size_position)) as SIZE_POSITION, decode(trim(b.x_size),NULL,decode(trim(b.sku),NULL,a.x_size,substr(trim(b.sku),length(trim(b.sku))-3,1)),trim(b.x_size)) as X_SIZE, decode(trim(b.pack_code),NULL,decode(trim(b.sku),NULL,NULL,substr(trim(b.sku),length(trim(b.sku))-2,1)),trim(pack_code)) as PACK_CODE FROM (select item_id, size_num, x_size from slba_item where division_group = 'slu') a, ( select item_id, size_num, size_line, size_position, x_size, pack_code, sku from slba_item where division_group = 'slu' and item_type = 'SEL' ) b where a.item_id = b.item_id

and trim(SI.sap_grid_value) is not null and trim(SI.sap_material_num) is not null group by sap_material_num, sap_grid_value)

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.legacy_source AS LEGACY_SOURCE, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_driver AS DEMAND_DRIVER, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_loc AS DEMAND_LOC, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.style AS STYLE, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.color AS COLOR, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.item_code_attr_cde AS ITEM_CODE_ATTR_CDE, fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.item_code_siz AS ITEM_CODE_SIZ FROM (SELECT fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.legacy_source AS LEGACY_SOURCE , fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_driver AS DEMAND_DRIVER , Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_style_code) AS STYLE, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_color_code) AS COLOR, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_attribute_code) AS ITEM_CODE_ATTR_CDE, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_size_code) AS ITEM_CODE_SIZ , Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_loc) AS demand_loc FROM fcst_dpr_finished_product_item WHERE legacy_source IN ( 'CSW', 'CHP', 'PRT' ) AND aps_corp_business_unit IN ( 'CSW', 'CHP', 'PRT' ) and Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_loc) = '__' UNION ALL SELECT fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.legacy_source AS LEGACY_SOURCE , fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_driver AS DEMAND_DRIVER, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_style_code) AS STYLE, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_color_code) AS COLOR, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_attribute_code) AS ITEM_CODE_ATTR_CDE, Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.aps_size_code) AS ITEM_CODE_SIZ , Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_loc) AS demand_loc FROM fcst_dpr_finished_product_item WHERE legacy_source IN ( 'HBI' ) and Trim(fcst_dpr_finished_product_item.demand_loc) = '__') fcst_dpr_finished_product_item

TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELLING_STYLE = I_SELLING_STYLE AND COLOR_CODE = I_COLOR_CODE AND SIZE_NUM = I_SIZE_NUM AND ATTRIBUTION_CODE = I_ATTRIBUTION_CODE

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT a.ITEM_ID as ITEM_ID, a.FCST_SKU_KEY as FCST_SKU_KEY, a.BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID as BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID from (select min (SI.item_id ) as ITEM_ID,fis.fcst_sku_key as fcst_sku_key,fis.BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID as BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID FROM SLBA_ITEM SI, STYLE_MASTER_1 SM1 , FCST_ITEM_SKU FIS, fcst_division_control b WHERE SI.DIVISION_GROUP = SM1.DIVISION_GROUP AND RTRIM(SI.STYLE_NUM)= RTRIM(SM1.STYLE_NUM) AND decode(si.company_code,null,'--',' ','--',si.company_code) = sm1.company_code AND (SI.ITEM_STATUS <> 'X' or SI.ITEM_STATUS is null) AND FIS.ITEM_ID=SI.ITEM_ID AND FIS.FCST_SKU_KEY !='UNMAPPED' and b.active_ind = 'Y' and fis.division_code = b.division_code AND fis.division_group = b.division_group GROUP BY fis.fcst_sku_key, fis.BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID )a

SESSION.DESCRIPTION: This session is used to load the FCST_DEMAND_PRODUCT table.
SESSION.NAME: s_m_FCST_DEMAND_PRODUCT

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select a.ITEM_ID, a.STYLE_NUM , a.COLOR_CODE, a.ATTRIBUTION_CODE, a.SIZE_NUM, a.SIZE_DESC, a.SIZE_MNEMON_CODE, a.STYLE_GROUP, a.CUP_SIZE, a.GARM_PER_PKG_QTY, a.PACK_CODE, a.SAP_WHOLESALE_PRICE, a.BRAND_NAME, a.CAPACITY_GROUP, a.DIVISION_GROUP, a.SAP_GRID_VALUE, a.SAP_MATERIAL_NUM, a.X_SIZE, a.SIZE_POSITION, a.SIZE_LINE, a.COMPANY_CODE , a.DIVISION_CODE, a.LRP_STYLE, a.MASTER_GRMT_STYLE, a.SELLING_STYLE, a.GENDER_CATEGORY_DESC, a.GENDER_DESC, a.MARKETING_LOB_GROUP, a.CATEGORY_DESC, a.SUBCATEGORY_DESC, a.FABRICATION, a.SILHOUETTE, a.DUMMY_STYLE_IND, a.LEVEL_3_NAME, a.FREE_GOODS_QTY, a.COLOR_NAME, a.PRODUCT_GROUP_DESC, a.UPC_CODE, a.PRODUCT_LINE_DESC, a.BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID, a.FCST_SKU_KEY, a.UPDATE_USERID, a.STYLE_DESC from (SELECT FIS.ITEM_ID as ITEM_ID, TRIM (SI.STYLE_NUM) AS STYLE_NUM , SI.COLOR_CODE as COLOR_CODE, SI.ATTRIBUTION_CODE as ATTRIBUTION_CODE, SI.SIZE_NUM as SIZE_NUM, SI.SIZE_DESC as SIZE_DESC, SI.SIZE_MNEMON_CODE as SIZE_MNEMON_CODE, SM1.STYLE_GROUP as STYLE_GROUP, SI.CUP_SIZE as CUP_SIZE, NVL(SI.GARM_PER_PKG_QTY,1) as GARM_PER_PKG_QTY, SI.PACK_CODE as PACK_CODE, SI.SAP_WHOLESALE_PRICE as SAP_WHOLESALE_PRICE, SI.BRAND_NAME as BRAND_NAME, SI.CAPACITY_GROUP as CAPACITY_GROUP, SI.DIVISION_GROUP as DIVISION_GROUP, SI.SAP_GRID_VALUE as SAP_GRID_VALUE, SI.SAP_MATERIAL_NUM as SAP_MATERIAL_NUM, SI.X_SIZE as X_SIZE, SI.SIZE_POSITION as SIZE_POSITION, SI.SIZE_LINE as SIZE_LINE, NVL(TRIM (SI.COMPANY_CODE),'--') AS COMPANY_CODE , SI.DIVISION_CODE as DIVISION_CODE, SM1.LRP_STYLE as LRP_STYLE, SM1.MASTER_GRMT_STYLE as MASTER_GRMT_STYLE, SM1.SELLING_STYLE as SELLING_STYLE, SM1.GENDER_CATEGORY_DESC as GENDER_CATEGORY_DESC, SM1.GENDER_DESC as GENDER_DESC, SM1.MARKETING_LOB_GROUP as MARKETING_LOB_GROUP, SM1.CATEGORY_DESC as CATEGORY_DESC, SM1.SUBCATEGORY_DESC as SUBCATEGORY_DESC, SM1.FABRICATION as FABRICATION, SM1.SILHOUETTE as SILHOUETTE, SM1.DUMMY_STYLE_IND as DUMMY_STYLE_IND, SM1.LEVEL_3_NAME as LEVEL_3_NAME, SI.FREE_GOODS_QTY as FREE_GOODS_QTY, SI.COLOR_NAME as COLOR_NAME, SM1.PRODUCT_GROUP_DESC as PRODUCT_GROUP_DESC, SI.UPC_CODE as UPC_CODE, SI.PRODUCT_LINE_DESC as PRODUCT_LINE_DESC, FIS.BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID as BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID, FIS.FCST_SKU_KEY as FCST_SKU_KEY, FIS.UPDATE_USERID AS UPDATE_USERID, SM1.STYLE_DESC AS STYLE_DESC, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (Partition by FIS.FCST_SKU_KEY,FIS.BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID ORDER BY FIS.ITEM_ID DESC) RNK FROM SLBA_ITEM SI, STYLE_MASTER_1 SM1 , FCST_ITEM_SKU FIS, fcst_division_control b WHERE SI.DIVISION_GROUP = SM1.DIVISION_GROUP AND RTRIM(SI.STYLE_NUM)= RTRIM(SM1.STYLE_NUM) AND decode(si.company_code,null,'--',' ','--',si.company_code) = sm1.company_code AND (SI.ITEM_STATUS <> 'X' or SI.ITEM_STATUS is null) AND FIS.ITEM_ID=SI.ITEM_ID AND FIS.FCST_SKU_KEY !='UNMAPPED' and b.active_ind = 'Y' and fis.division_code = b.division_code AND fis.division_group = b.division_group )a where a.RNK=1 and mod(a.item_id,5) = 0

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select a.ITEM_ID, a.STYLE_NUM , a.COLOR_CODE, a.ATTRIBUTION_CODE, a.SIZE_NUM, a.SIZE_DESC, a.SIZE_MNEMON_CODE, a.STYLE_GROUP, a.CUP_SIZE, a.GARM_PER_PKG_QTY, a.PACK_CODE, a.SAP_WHOLESALE_PRICE, a.BRAND_NAME, a.CAPACITY_GROUP, a.DIVISION_GROUP, a.SAP_GRID_VALUE, a.SAP_MATERIAL_NUM, a.X_SIZE, a.SIZE_POSITION, a.SIZE_LINE, a.COMPANY_CODE , a.DIVISION_CODE, a.LRP_STYLE, a.MASTER_GRMT_STYLE, a.SELLING_STYLE, a.GENDER_CATEGORY_DESC, a.GENDER_DESC, a.MARKETING_LOB_GROUP, a.CATEGORY_DESC, a.SUBCATEGORY_DESC, a.FABRICATION, a.SILHOUETTE, a.DUMMY_STYLE_IND, a.LEVEL_3_NAME,
